short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily Extract & Export Whatsapp contacts into CSV, Excel, HTML, JSON, and Markdown

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
WhatsContact - Whatsap Contacts Extractor & Exporter is a powerful and easy-to-use extension that helps you backup and manage your whatsapp contacts quickly.

Why Choose Our Extension?

🔒 Privacy-First: We don't collect any personal data. We only extract and export contacts already stored on your device.
⚡ Fast & Free Support: Get quick and reliable help whenever you need it.
🚀 Save Time and Effort: Extract, filter, and export contacts in bulk in just a few clicks.
🎨 Beautiful UI: A clean, easy-to-use interface that ensures a smooth experience.
📂 Extract Contacts: Extract from chats, groups, countries, labels
💾 Export Data: Export to CSV, XLSX, JSON, HTML, or Markdown formats for secure backup.
🔍 Advanced Filters: Filter by contact type, message type, and account type to streamline your data.
🌙 Auto Dark Mode: Automatically adjusts to dark mode based on your WhatsApp Web settings.
📱 Personal Users: Easily back up and organize both saved and unsaved contacts, including direct downloads of unknown numbers.
💼 Business Users: Export contacts in bulk for professional use and manage client data more efficiently.
🌍 International Users: Extract contacts based on countries for regional communication.
👥 Group Admins: Manage and download contacts of group members, both saved and unsaved, for better organization.

WhatsApp is a trademark of WhatsApp Inc., registered in the U.S. and other countries. This extension has no relationship with WhatsApp or WhatsApp Inc.
